TRYTOBEGOOD

Fei Liu is a designer, artist, writer and DJ exploring digital empathy, and the narrative potential of interfaces.

Example of the interface

Diagram

New Mercy Park

2016

New Mercy Park is a Choose Your Own Adventure and immersive experimental coding tutorial situated in a world of embeddable neural AI interfaces and virtual intimacies. I use storytelling in physical and digital space, and a combination of games, hands-on workshops, and immersive theater, to make coding concepts easier to understand for artists and designers. It is currently being developed as part of Digital Solitude project in progress at Akademie Schloss Solitude.
